title: Forged from Fate: Ashes: Book 1
description:
Phoenix, Daemons, and Dragons were just the things of myth. Weren’t they?

Lexi always knew that she was different, and so did everyone else around her. Her presence made people uneasy, and she withdrew into herself, until her whole world was turned upside down.Starting over in a small college town, Lexi is about to find out that the real world is no fairy tale. Diving into a world of magic and mythology, Lexi is swept up in a battle of love and vengeance where death is just the beginning.  
Can her heart survive the destiny the Fates have in store for her? You’ll love this romantic paranormal fantasy because finding true love is the greatest quest of all, even if it means fighting through Heaven and Hell to keep it.


*

This book contains swearing and mature adult content. Strong male leads, and feisty independent women.
author: Randi Liz Drake
